name: Wordish
description:
Wordish takes word games to the next level! Find the proper words in this challenging and customizable puzzle game. Try to guess the word using a limited number of tries. Challenge your friends through share codes or even with live multiplayer!

Features
  • A new puzzle each day to challenge yourself
  • Endless customizable challenge levels to continue playing
  • Challenge your friends through codes or even live multiplayer
  • Level up your game through the xp system
  • Relax with a nice fireplace
  • Share your results and challenge other players
